results.author: Phileas Fogg
results.content: Fabulous action movie. Lots of interesting characters. They don't make many movies like this. The whole movie from start to finish was entertaining I'm looking forward to seeing it again. I definitely recommend seeing it.

results.author: Andres Gomez
results.content: Good action movie with a decent script for the genre. The photography is really good too but, in the end, it is quite repeating itself from beginning to end and the stormy OST is exhausting.

results.author: extoix
results.content: Awesome movie!  WITNESS ME will stick with me forever!
